page.title: Funds Seek to Nominate Disney Directors
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Four of the biggest U.S. public pension funds said Tuesday they would press for the right to have shareholders nominate directors to Walt Disney Co.'s <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DIS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DIS.N</A> board of directors.
